problems.title: Count Number of Nice Subarrays (Sliding Window)
problems.description:
Given an array of integers nums and an integer k. A continuous subarray is called nice if there are k odd numbers on it.
Return the number of nice sub-arrays.

Input Format:
First line: two integers n and k.
Second line: n space-separated integers.

Output Format:
Print a single integer: the number of nice sub-arrays.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5 3
1 1 2 1 1

Sample Output
2

Explanation:
The only sub-arrays with 3 odd numbers are [1,1,2,1] and [1,2,1,1].
hintsList: Use a sliding window or prefix sum to count odd numbers.
Consider transforming the array: odd -> 1, even -> 0.
